README
Kmhmu MX Release 1.002
2014
========================

Thank you for your interest in the Kmhmu MX font.
We hope you find it useful!

Kmhmu MX provides glyphs for the Lao script orthography of Kmhmu.

Kmhmu MX is released under the SIL Open Font License.

See the OFL and OFL-FAQ for details of the SIL Open Font License.
